metadata.title: CVE-2018-8754 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** The libevt_record_values_read_event() function inlibevt_record_values.c in libevt before 2018-03-17 does not properly checkfor out-of-bounds values of user SID data size, strings size, or data size.NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described in libyal/libevt issue 5 onGitHub.

criterions.comment: libevt package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
